title: History of typography and architects who have used it in their work
content:
Hello.  
I'm student of architecture and I have been given an assignment about typography. I need history of typography and list of architects who have used it in their work along with photos if possible.  
Help will be highly appreciated.
author: Shahpara

comments.content: New here. Need help. Have to submit assignment before friday. Please do help!!!!!!!!
Asking a random stranger on the internet is not research.

You cannot do a good job of this by Friday.

hhp
you may want to write something about the bauhaus. fonts, architecture, design, philosophy you can find everything in there
